Class Vertex

java.lang.Object
Vertex
public class Vertex
extends java.lang.Object
Every vertex has a String label, and stores a reference to the graph it belongs to. The neighbors of a vertex are stored in an adjacency list of Vertex objects. To facilitate depth-first and breadth-first search, each vertex has a reference to a parent vertex and stores an integer mark.
